Today in Caithness, surf is looking solid at 4 ft @ 11s W with a light 12 mph S wind. Point of Ness and Murkle Point are both clean and fun, perfect for a session. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 4 ft @ 10s with fresh 21 mph SSE winds, making it less appealing. By the day after, surf continues to decline to 3 ft @ 8s with 23 mph SSE winds, so it’s best to enjoy today’s waves. Best: today.
